name: Shruti Garg

projects.name: Weather-App
projects.description: A user-friendly weather app that provides real-time weather updates, and detailed weather information for any location. Featuring intuitive design and dynamic data visualization, it ensures a seamless user experience.

projects.name: JARVIS- AI Desktop Voice Assistant
projects.description: Developed a personalized AI assistant using Python. Implemented speech recognition functionalities using libraries like SpeechRecognition and pyttsx3, enabling hands-free interaction with the assistant.

projects.name: Adventure- Parallax effect
projects.description: Developed a dynamic adventure-themed website featuring engaging parallax scrolling effects for an immersive user experience. Enhanced visual appeal through custom animations and user-friendly navigation.

projects.name: NewsCat- Daily News app
projects.description: Developed a responsive news application using React.js, showcasing proficient utilization of frontend technologies. Detail attention in resolving frontend challenges and optimizing performance.

experiences.description: Gained hands-on experience with ServiceNow's cloud-based platform, focusing on IT service management and automation. Enhanced skills in scripting, problem-solving, and enterprise IT operations.
An online internship offering hands-on experience and practical skills in data science and ML. Project-based learning provided with real time problem and methods to solve such problems.
